alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 21 at 10:01PM CST until February 21 at 10:45PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... * Until 1045 PM CST. * At 1000 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Ranger, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mineral Wells, Graford, Gordon, Possum Kingdom State Park, Strawn and Mingus. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 374 and 389. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
